!aws configure set aws_access_key_id <your_aws_access_key_id>
!aws configure set aws_secret_access_key <your_aws_secret_access_key>

## Configuring AWS  

To create the an AWS credentials for refer the [Basic Conguration Docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-configure-quickstart.html)

Refer this [link](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-configure-files.html) for complete guide on Configuration and credential file settings

## That's it!!!
- Now you have successfully installed 
- You have configured the AWS cli v2 with your credentials
- Now you can installed the python libraries to use the tool to fulfil your applications purpose
